Alvin!

What is it, Simon? Well, I would never say this to Alvin.

Hot! WAITER: Sorry.
Hot!

translation.en: All right, got it.
What are you doing?
What? Building a fire.
You know, one time in the studio, Snoop ran out of matches,
translation.es: Una vez en el estudio, Snoop se quedó sin fósforos,

translation.en: got a blaze going with just two carrot sticks.
Figure, how hard can it be?
Forget the fire. We have to start hiking.
translation.es: Olvídate de la fogata. Empecemos a caminar.

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dave. Look, it's getting dark- ish.
It's gonna be cold. I'm gonna build a fire. We'll go in the morning.
translation.es: Hará frío. Encenderé una fogata. Iremos en la mañana.

translation.en: No, we'll go now.
Don't take that tone of voice with me, Dave.
translation.es: No uses ese tono de voz conmigo, Dave.

translation.en: I'm not one of your chipmunks that you can just boss around
translation.es: No soy una de las ardillas que mandoneas

translation.en: and stuff into a cage whenever you feel like it.
translation.es: y metes en una jaula cuando te place.

translation.en: That was you, Ian!
translation.es: ¡Eso es lo que hiciste tú, Ian!

translation.en: Calm down.
Jeez, no wonder those furballs would rather fly off the ship
translation.es: Dios, entiendo por qué esas bolas de pelo prefirieron volar del barco

translation.en: than spend another day with you.
translation.es: antes que pasar otro día contigo.

translation.en: They didn't do it on purpose.
It was an accident. They're just kids.
I don't know how long they can survive out there.
translation.es: No sé cuánto puedan sobrevivir allí.

translation.en: And you guys were worried.  Look at us!
We're warm, we got a great fire going, beautiful night sky
translation.es: Estamos calentitos, tenemos una fogata encendida, un lindo cielo nocturno

translation.en: and if a rescue helicopter comes by, they'll see us!
translation.es: y si pasa un helicóptero, ¡nos verá!

translation.en: Everything's gonna be fine.
Good night, guys.
Good night. Good night.
Good night.
Night.
Theodore!
What? Dave always turns off the light after saying good night.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Dave siempre apaga la luz después de dar las buenas noches.

translation.en: That fire was sort of the only thing keeping us from freezing to death.
translation.es: Ese fuego era lo que impedía que muriéramos congelados.

translation.en: Yeah! Can't you just relight it?
How? With your glasses. And the sun?
All right! Way to keep the spirits up, guys.
Doing it, yeah!
And what is this supposed to be? Breakfast!
translation.es: -¿Qué se supone que es eso? -¡El desayuno!

translation.en: No, it's bark.
Yeah, for breakfast!
I bet it's very good.
It's not.
It's been forever since our last all- you- can- eat buffet.
translation.es: Ha pasado mucho tiempo desde nuestro último buffet.

translation.en: Crazy suggestion, guys,
let's get off this beach and let's find some real food.
translation.es: Salgamos de esta playa y busquemos comida de verdad.

translation.en: If I know my horticulture, and I do, this is a grove of mango trees.
translation.es: Sé de horticultura, y éste es un bosque de mangos.

translation.en: Then where are all the mangoes?
Maybe the Jungle Monster 4 ate them all!
translation.es: ¡Tal vez se los comió el Monstruo de la Jungla 4!

translation.en: You were planning on sharing that, right?
Of course.
Oh, well, good.
'Cause it kind of looked like you were gonna eat it all by yourself.
translation.es: Porque parecía que ibas a comértelo tú solo.

translation.en: What? I would never do that.
I don't believe you!
Hey!
Yeah! Winning!
What?
I'll make sure to save you the pit!
Oh, my acorns!
Way to go, Theodore! Come on, we'll split it.
translation.es: ¡Así se hace, Teodoro! Vamos, lo compartiremos.

translation.en: Don't listen to him, Theo.
He's gonna eat it all by himself.
I'll share it with you.
No. She's trying to trick you.
No, you're trying to trick him.
No, you're trying to trick him by saying I'm trying to trick him.
translation.es: No, tú tratas de engañarlo diciéndole que yo lo engaño.

translation.en: He's lying, Theo!
What?
Theodore, I am so sorry!
Oh, no!
My precious! My precious!
Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Look at us.
One day on this island and we've become animals!
translation.es: ¡Un día en una isla y nos hemos vuelto animales!

translation.en: Did you hear that?
What was that? Jungle Monster.
translation.es: -¿Qué fue eso? -El Monstruo de la Jungla.

translation.en: Positions, everybody.
Hold.
Hold.
Fire!
No! Why?
Please don't eat us, Mr. Jungle Monster!
translation.es: ¡Por favor no nos coma, Sr. Monstruo de la Jungla!

translation.en: I'm not a monster, I'm Zoe. And I'm clearly a girl
translation.es: No soy un monstruo, soy Zoe. Y por cierto soy una chica

translation.en: who has been on this island for so long
translation.es: que ha estado tanto tiempo en esta isla

translation.en: that now she's imagining that squirrels can talk.
translation.es: que ahora imagina que las ardillas hablan.

translation.en: We are chipmunks.
Yeah, Alvin and the Chipmunks.
Who and the what now?
I'm sure you've heard of the Chipettes. We're kind of world famous.
translation.es: Seguro has oído hablar de Las Chipettes. Somos famosas.

translation.en: Who?
Maybe this will help.
Lame! Okay. Stop.
I don't know who you are.
Awkward!
Exactly how long have you been here?
Well, I got here on a Monday, so...
translation.es: Bueno, llegué un lunes, así que...

translation.en: Yeah, like, you know, eight or nine years?
translation.es: Más o menos ocho o nueve años.

translation.en: Nine years? Wait. You've been here nine years?
Well, it could be eight.
What if we're here nine years?
What if we're here forever?
I told you, Dave's coming.
I used to think that Dave was coming, too.
And he never did.
Dave Henderson, my supervisor at UPS.
translation.es: Dave Henderson, mi supervisor en UPS.

translation.en: I used to fly cargo planes for them,
translation.es: Piloteaba aviones de carga para la empresa,

translation.en: until one day I crash- landed in the ocean.
translation.es: pero un día me estrellé en el océano.

translation.en: We crash- landed, too. Really?
But our Dave won't rest until he finds us.
translation.es: Pero nuestro Dave no descansará hasta encontrarnos.

translation.en: Right, Alvin?
Absolutely.
You mean I'm finally gonna get out of here?
translation.es: ¿O sea que finalmente saldré de aquí?

translation.en: I can't wait to go tell the others!
There are others?
I mean, can you guys imagine being stuck here for all these years
translation.es: ¿Pueden imaginarse estar aquí todos estos años

translation.en: without anybody to talk to?
I think I'd lose my mind!
Chipmunks, I'm pleased to introduce my friends.
translation.es: Ardillas, les presento a mis amigos.

translation.en: This is Rawlings, Spalding, Callaway, Dunlop, and, right there, that's Nerf.
translation.es: Rawlings, Spalding, Callaway, Dunlop, y allá está Nerf.

translation.en: Hey, girlfriend, you look good.
They survived the crash with me.
Okay.
Hi. Hi.
Okay. Hello.
I'm Theodore.
Guys, Dave is coming to get us!
No, not Dave Henderson. I saw your face!
translation.es: No, no Dave Henderson. ¡Vi tu expresión!

translation.en: It's another Dave.
But, you guys, just get excited. We're finally gonna get off this island.
She's funny.
In a crazy sort of way.
This totally calls for a party. Who's hungry?
Yeah! Yes, please!
We are famished. I'm hungry.
Yeah? Let's go to my place.
Is it far? I don't think I could walk another step.
translation.es: ¿Es lejos? No creo que podamos caminar ni un paso más.

translation.en: Who said anything about walking?
We're gonna die!
Oh, man! That was so cool!
I know, I know!
Come on. Come on in, guys! Bring it in.
Come on down!
Yeah! Wasn't that awesome?
No, it was not awesome. It's a miracle we got here safely.
translation.es: No, no lo fue. Es un milagro que hayamos llegado a salvo.

translation.en: In fact, the odds of a chipmunk
translation.es: Las probabilidades de que una ardilla

translation.en: getting hurt on a zip- line are one out of six.
translation.es: se lastime al lanzarse por un cable son de una en seis.

translation.en: Why do I always have to be right?
Ellie, Ellie! Are you okay?
I think I sprained my ankle!
translation.es: Creo que me torcí un tobillo.

translation.en: Ooh, you know what, you should put some ice on that.
Oh, no, guys, I don't have any ice. I live there in that tree.
translation.es: No, chicos, no tengo hielo. Vivo en ese árbol.

translation.en: I thought that maybe you did, though.
No, we don't have any ice. Just like we don't have any shelter.
translation.es: No, no tenemos hielo. Y no tenemos refugio.

translation.en: Wow, that's a major bummer for you.
Do you guys like bungee jumping? Yes!
No. We do not.
Listen, lady, maybe you should just leave us alone
translation.es: Señora, creo que será mejor que nos deje solos

translation.en: so we can focus more on surviving and less on killing ourselves.
translation.es: para que podamos sobrevivir en vez de matarnos.

translation.en: Whoa, that is a lot of uptight in a very little package.
translation.es: ¡Vaya! Cuánta seriedad en un frasco tan pequeño.

translation.en: I'm not uptight. I just don't wanna see anyone else getting hurt. Ow!
translation.es: No soy serio. Es que no quiero que nadie se lastime.

translation.en: Criminy. What was that?
You know what, that was just a spider
and they live here because this is nature.
translation.es: y viven aquí porque esto es la naturaleza.

translation.en: It is not just a spider, it's a Phoneutria bahiensis.
translation.es: No es sólo una araña, es una Phoneutria bahiensis.

translation.en: Its bite contains a neurotoxin.
Ooh! Mr. Fancy Words. So what?
Alvin, toxin? Poison? Neuro? Brain?
Oh. That's not good.
Side effects include changes in personality,
translation.es: Los efectos colaterales incluyen cambios en la personalidad,

translation.en: loss of inhibition, dry mouth.
translation.es: pérdida de inhibición, sequedad en la boca.

translation.en: Okay, calm down. I get bitten probably twice a day by these little fellows
translation.es: Cálmate. Me pican dos veces al día

translation.en: and I am still completely normal.
Yes, normal.
Oh, no.
Alvin? Simon!
Chubby one!
Girl chubby one!
Brittany? Jeanette?
I hope they're okay.
Who cares if they're okay? I just need them to be here.
translation.es: ¿A quién le importa que estén bien? Necesito que estén aquí.

translation.en: And here I am thinking you've changed and don't only care about yourself.
translation.es: Y yo que pensaba que habías cambiado y ya no te preocupabas sólo por ti mismo.

translation.en: Nope. And it's a good thing, too.
Because right now the rage I'm feeling for you and those chipmunks
translation.es: Porque la rabia que siento hacia ti y esas ardillas

translation.en: is the only thing keeping me going.
translation.es: es lo único que me motiva.

translation.en: Shall we keep going?
Ian, just keep an eye out for something to eat or drink, all right?
translation.es: Ian, busca algo para comer o beber, ¿sí?

translation.en: All right. Right there!
Where? That thing around your neck.
translation.es: -¿Dónde? -Esa cosa que tienes en el cuello.

translation.en: You're not gonna eat this. This was a gift from Theodore.
translation.es: No vas a comer esto. Es un regalo de Teodoro.

translation.en: That explains it. I was gonna say, it's really ugly.
translation.es: Eso lo explica todo. Es muy feo.

translation.en: Like, really... Wow.
Ugly. It's not ugly.
It goes with everything and it's soft enough to sleep in.
translation.es: Combina con todo y puedes dormir con él.

translation.en: Yeah, and it's edible.
You will not eat my son's necklace.
translation.es: No te comerás el collar de mi hijo.

translation.en: He's not your son, Dave. He's just a chipmunk.
translation.es: No es tu hijo, Dave. Es sólo una ardilla.

translation.en: Oh, Dave. Where are you?
Where are you, Alvin?
All right.
I'm gonna crash.
Simon. Where are you going?
Who is this Simon you speak of?
translation.es: ¿Quién es ese Simón del que hablas?

translation.en: Um, you?
No, my name is not Simon. It is
translation.es: No, no me llamo Simón. Me llamo

translation.en: Simone!
That's pretty close to Simon.
And yet completely different.
translation.es: Y sin embargo es completamente diferente.

translation.en: Would you care to join me on my adventure?
What adventure?
The adventure called life!
Okay.
But just until Dave shows up.
Alvin, Alvin!
Simon and Theodore are gone.
They probably just went to get stuff for the shelter.
translation.es: Deben haber ido a buscar cosas para el refugio.

translation.en: It's all the guy can talk about.
translation.es: Es de lo único que habla.

translation.en: Still, it's not like them to wander off like that.
translation.es: Pero él no suele irse de ese modo.

translation.en: Could you please go look for them?
Why can't you?
I have a situation of my own to deal with, Alvin.
Oh, right. How is Eleanor doing?
Huh? She's fine. I'm talking about me.
It's been two days since my last bath and I am a mess.
translation.es: Hace dos días que no me baño y estoy hecha un desastre.

translation.en: I can't get rescued looking like this.
translation.es: No quiero que me rescaten en este estado.

translation.en: Oy.
Theo! Simon! Simon!
Theodore! Theo!
Si! Theo!
Bonjour, my friend.
Simon? Are you bungee jumping?
His name is not Simon. It is Simone.
That's pretty close to Simon.
Yeah, I thought so, too. But he's acting totally different.
translation.es: Opino lo mismo. Pero actúa totalmente diferente.

translation.en: The spider bite! That's it! Remember the side effects?
translation.es: ¡La mordedura de araña! ¿Recuerdas los efectos colaterales?

translation.en: Personality changes, loss of inhibition?
translation.es: Cambios de personalidad, pérdida de la inhibición.

translation.en: Lies! Who are you?
Wow! Simone is pretty cool.
It's Simon, Theodore. And, no, he's not.
translation.es: Es Simón, Teodoro. Y no es fascinante.

translation.en: Au revoir, Alfred.
Alvin. It's Alvin!
Whoo! C'est magnifique, Simone!
Okay, Theo, it's all you.
Really? I've never done anything like this.
translation.es: ¿De veras? Nunca he hecho algo así.

translation.en: And you never will.
How can you let him do this? What are you thinking?
I'm thinking, When did my dad wash up on this island?
translation.es: Estoy pensando: ¿Cuando llegó papá a la isla?

translation.en: What? We were having the best time.
Why do you have to show up and be so uptight?
Me? Uptight?
I'm not the uptight one, I'm the fun one!
translation.es: Yo no soy el serio, ¡soy el divertido!

translation.en: The cool one. Ask anybody.
translation.es: El de onda. Pregúntales a todos.

translation.en: Who should I ask?
Come on. Theodore, you can't bungee jump.
translation.es: Vamos. Teodoro, no puedes hacer un salto bungee.

translation.en: You get scared just watching a movie.
Munk up, Alvin.
A little help?
Ah! Much better.
Jeanette, these dresses are, like, totally adorbs. I die.
translation.es: Jeanette, estos vestidos son adorables. Me muero.

translation.en: Thank you. And I also made these for you, Eleanor.
translation.es: Gracias. Y también te hice esto, Eleanor.

translation.en: Oh, look how handy you are all of a sudden.
And in case you get tired, I made you a wheelchair.
translation.es: Y por si te cansas, te hice una silla de ruedas.

translation.en: Oh, super.
A kiss. Enchante, mademoiselles.
A kiss. And a...
A kiss.
Spider venom. What's gotten into him?
Yeah, yeah, he thinks he's some sort of fun- loving French dude.
Now he thinks he's... Really?
The most interesting munk in the world.
translation.es: La ardilla más interesante del mundo.

translation.en: Simon? Simon.
Simone? Oui?
I think we should get to work on that shelter.
translation.es: Creo que debemos empezar a trabajar en el refugio.

translation.en: Pourquoi? I cannot imagine a better roof over our heads
than the stars in the sky.
translation.es: que las estrellas en el cielo.

translation.en: What about the kind of roof over our head that's actually a roof?
translation.es: ¿Y qué te parece un techo de verdad?

translation.en: It's going to rain!
What is a little rain? Hmm?
translation.es: Es sólo un poco de lluvia.

translation.en: We cherish the water, for it is the water that nurtures the flower.
translation.es: Adoramos el agua, porque el agua nutre a la flor.

translation.en: Okay. This is crazy!
Building a shelter was your idea. Yours!
Oh, great. Great!
All right, guys, we're gonna build a shelter.
I need everyone's help. Let's go.
translation.es: Necesito la ayuda de todos. Vamos.

translation.en: I'll try. But I feel so useless.
translation.es: Lo intentaré. Pero me siento tan inútil.

translation.en: What are you doing? What I've wanted to do
since the moment I laid my eyes all over on you.
translation.es: desde la primera vez que te vi.

translation.en: What? Huh?
Hey, you guys are going to catch pneumonia
dancing in the rain like that.
You ought to be careful kicking mud around like that.
translation.es: Deben tener cuidado, están arrojando barro.

translation.en: Hello?
Someone could lose an eye!
That looks like fun.
Eleanor? Would you care to dance? I'd love to.
With me?  Yes, Theodore!
I can't believe Jeanette's getting all the attention.
translation.es: No puedo creerlo, Jeanette es el centro de atención.

translation.en: I'm the pretty one. Jeanette's the smart one.
translation.es: Yo soy la bonita. Jeanette es la inteligente.

translation.en: You don't see me running around trying to be all smart, do you?
translation.es: No me ves haciéndome la inteligente por ahí, ¿no?

translation.en: I know! I'm the fun one,
you're the pretty one. Yeah!
Do you know how slippery that dirt is? This is ridiculous.
translation.es: ¿No ven que el barro es resbaladizo? Es ridículo.

translation.en: Are you even listening to me?
Simon!
Alvin? You're starting to sound like Dave.
No!
What are you doing?
Ugh. Building a shelter.
Since I'm not the fun one anymore
translation.es: Como ya no soy el divertido,

translation.en: I figure I may as well be...
The responsible one.
Ew. Really?
Well, since I'm not the pretty one anymore, maybe I should build a shelter, too.
translation.es: Bueno, como ya no soy la bonita, tal vez deba construir un refugio también.

translation.en: Yeah, good luck with that.
What, you don't think I could do it?
Hey, I didn't say that, Brit.
I thought it, but I didn't say it.
translation.es: Lo pensé, pero no lo dije.

translation.en: So you wanna play it this way.
He's so French.
Oh! Be careful, Simone!
Let's do it.
Oh, no.
Now, wasn't that a pleasant ride?
Good thing we don't wear pants.
translation.es: Es bueno que no usemos pantalones.

translation.en: Okay, you guys, come on, come over.
Are you sure it's safe? Of course it's safe.
I do this thing every day.
Jeanette! THEODORE: Jeanette!
Hold on, Jeanette.
No, no. Look into my eyes.
You have nothing to fear.
Yes, yes. Very good.
Voila! You are safe. Bravo!
You're so brave. You made it!
Pretty.
Double rainbow. What does it mean?
Alive they're superstars, sure. But dead? They're legends.
translation.es: Mientras están vivos son superestrellas. Pero muertos, son leyendas.

translation.en: I'm talking about tribute albums, pay- per- view funerals.
translation.es: Hablo de álbumes tributo, funerales en canales prepagos.

translation.en: Wait a second. You actually think I'm in this for the money?
translation.es: Espera un minuto. ¿De veras crees que estoy en esto por dinero?

translation.en: Well, if you're doing it to pick up chicks, you're doing a lousy job.
translation.es: Si lo haces por las chicas, te va muy mal.

translation.en: I'm doing this because I love them, okay?
Look, if you wanna spend the rest of your life
translation.es: Mira, si quieres pasarte la vida

translation.en: running around after a bunch of spoiled brats, be my guest.
translation.es: corriendo detrás de una banda de malcriados, adelante.

translation.en: They're not brats. Really? Even Alvin?
You never even bothered to get to know them, Ian.
I mean, sure, Alvin can be kind of a handful,
but he means well.
He's sometimes just a little irresponsible, that's all.
translation.es: Sólo que a veces es un poco irresponsable.

translation.en: But, come on, Simon?
He's probably the most level- headed kid I know.
translation.es: Probablemente sea el chico más maduro que conozco.

translation.en: If anything, he's a little too uptight.
translation.es: A lo mucho, es demasiado serio.

translation.en: And then there's little Theodore.
Dave, I barely cared about what you had to say about the first two.
translation.es: Dave, apenas escuché lo que dijiste de los otros dos.

translation.en: I can't imagine the big- boned one is gonna be any more interesting.
translation.es: No creo que el gordito sea más interesante.

translation.en: Forget it, let's just keep going.
Up, poisson, up!
Oh, no. This is terrible.
Shouldn't he have come up by now?
Uh- oh. Simone! Where are you?
Zoe, you've gotta do something.
All right.
Callaway, I need you to go in there and find Simone.
translation.es: Callaway, necesito que te metas y encuentres a Simone.

translation.en: I know you can do it, little buddy.
You're kidding, right?
If Callaway can't find him, nobody can.
translation.es: Si Callaway no lo encuentra, nadie puede.

translation.en: Simone!
Told you.
I'm sorry if I caused you any worry, mademoiselle.
But I have something for you. Maybe this will be a way to make it up.
translation.es: Pero tengo algo para ti. Tal vez esto pueda compensarlo.

translation.en: Oh! It's beautiful!
Where did you find it?
Yeah, it is beautiful. Where did you find it?
In a cave behind the waterfall.
translation.es: En una cueva detrás de la cascada.

translation.en: I thought it would look nice on you.
But now I realize even the most precious gem cannot compare to your beauty.
translation.es: Pero ahora me doy cuenta de que ninguna gema preciosa se compara con tu belleza.

translation.en: Yeah. Were there any other jewels or gems or diamonds
translation.es: Sí. ¿Había otras joyas o gemas o diamantes

translation.en: or anything else in there?
By the time I found the gold,
I had already been gone from my Jeanette far too long. Aw!
translation.es: ya había estado lejos de mi Jeanette demasiado tiempo.

translation.en: What?
You guys, they found it. They found it!
And the best part is, they don't even know what they found.
translation.es: Y lo mejor es que no saben lo que encontraron.

translation.en: They think that it's just one bracelet.
translation.es: Creen que es sólo un brazalete.

translation.en: Which means that the rest of the treasure is mine.
translation.es: Lo que significa que el resto del tesoro es mío.

translation.en: All mine!
What the...
Whoa! What are you?
Hey! Oh!
Yeah, you're one of those honey badgers.
You just take what you want.
Drop it. Drop it!
You mess with me, ese,
I'll go loco on you.
Whoa! Hey!
Give it back!
You can sting like a bee or strike like a cobra,
translation.es: Puedes picar como abeja, o atacar como cobra,

translation.en: but this honey munk don't care!
translation.es: pero ¡a esta ardillita mielera no le importa!

translation.en: Okay, Brit, I'm all done.
If you want, I can help you get started... Whoa!
translation.es: Si quieres te ayudo a comenzar...

translation.en: This tree house is awesome.
translation.es: Esta casa del árbol es asombrosa.

translation.en: Maybe you are kind of the smart one.
translation.es: Tal vez tú seas la inteligente.

translation.en: Thank you, Alvin. And yours is...
translation.es: Gracias, Alvin. Y la tuya es...

translation.en: Well,
you did your best.
Anyhoo, no reason we can't be comfortable and stylish
translation.es: Bueno, se puede estar cómodo con estilo

translation.en: while we wait for Dave to show up, right?
Brit, I...
I think I know why Dave hasn't come.
translation.es: Creo que sé por qué Dave no ha venido.

translation.en: You do? Why?
'Cause he's not even looking.
Alvin, why wouldn't he be looking for us?
Because I drive him crazy.
You know, the way Simon's been driving me crazy?
translation.es: ¿Ves cómo Simón me ha vuelto loco?

translation.en: I mean, that's what I've been doing to Dave.
translation.es: Eso es lo que le he hecho a Dave.

translation.en: For years.
No wonder he hates me.
Don't worry, Alvin.
I'm sure Dave will come.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que Dave vendrá.

translation.en: I mean, he certainly loves Simon and Theodore.
translation.es: Ama a Simón y a Teodoro.

translation.en: Simon? Is Dave ever gonna find us?
Simon? I mean, Simone?
I'm so sorry, were you speaking to moi?
Yes! About Dave!
Are we ever going to find him?
I see you are sad, mon ami.
And I hate to see you sad.
I will help you find your friend Dave.
translation.es: Te ayudaré a encontrar a tu amigo Dave.

translation.en: You really think you can find him?
I know I can!
And then I will find this Simon you keep speaking of!
translation.es: ¡Luego encontraré al Simón del que tanto hablas!
